name: DORIS (rossee0813)
description:
DORIS is an educational game with 2D cartoon style puzzle based, telling about the main character, Doris is going an adventure to clean the rubbish that's been thrown into the river and the sea.

The game is inspired by the gold miner game, in which the players need to control the hook to catch the rubbish in the within time, pass the level after reaching the target score. When the game starts, the hook will constantly change the angle. When you feel that the angle of the hook is pointing to the position of the rubbish, press the hook to grab the rubbish.
